description:
It was hard to be a woman during the Sengoku period. You`d have to be a real tiger to survive among the constant warfare between rival daimyo... And that is exactly what Ii Naotora did!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Onna Ryoushu Ii Naotora, Tanjou Hen!
The Lady Feudal Lord, Ii Naotora! The Beginning!
女領主井伊直虎, 誕生編!
